name: Geo-Informatics Division - National Land Commission
description: The Geo-Informatics Division under the Department of Survey and Mapping at National Land Commission plays a crucial role in managing geographic data, employing GIS, RS and Surveying technology. It conducts user training, supports geospatial technology applications, develops and implements the National Spatial Data Infrastructure (NSDI), and operates the Centre for Geo-Information (CGI), which implements Bhutan’s Geographic Information (GI) Policy.
